title: Accessibility Problems: Tab Key Not Working in Help View
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before the tab key starts working. This issue occurs on Windows 2000 (Win2K) with the build date 20020326.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should allow me to navigate through different elements within the view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key without clicking on any "live" areas.

Expected result:
The tab key should allow navigation through different elements within the Help view.
